tool.name: Data Model to MDL
tool.description: Converts a JSON Data Model file into and MDL file.
tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool runs MCell on a JSON Data Model
The interface for this tool contains two pages (steps):
* **Step 1 of 2**. Upload a Data Model * **Step 2 of 2**. Run the Model
------
**Citation**
If you use this tool, please cite `Bartol T.M.; MCell ... . <http://www.mcell.org>`_
